SEARCH
Package A03

Class ColorTable

java.lang.Object
A03.ColorTable
public class ColorTable extends Object
The ColorTable class represents a palette of RGB colors. It stores unique color values and enforces constraints on the size and validity of the colors.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ColorTable(int paletteSize)
    Constructs a ColorTable object with the specified palette size.

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ColorTable

      public ColorTable(int paletteSize)
      Constructs a ColorTable object with the specified palette size.
      Parameters:
      paletteSize - The number of colors in the palette. Must be a power of two, greater than 1, and less than or equal to 1024.
      Throws:
      InvalidPaletteSizeException - If an invalid palette size is provided.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(int rgbValue)
      Adds a 24-bit RGB color to the color palette.
      Parameters:
      rgbValue - The RGB color value to add.
      Throws:
      InvalidRGBValueException - If an invalid RGB color value is provided.
      DuplicateRGBValueException - If the RGB color is already present in the palette.
      ExceedingCapacityException - If the color palette is already at its maximum capacity.

    • getPaletteSize

      public int getPaletteSize()
      Retrieves the size of the color palette.
      Returns:
      The size of the color palette.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(int rgbValue)
      Checks if the color palette contains a specific RGB color value.
      Parameters:
      rgbValue - The RGB color value to check.
      Returns:
      True if the color palette contains the specified RGB color; otherwise, false.
